Credits

This website was built upwards from the arguably the best bare-bones Jekyll starter theme by Garett Boatman.

I also thank Matt Boldt for typed.js, Alvaro Trigo for the cool fullpage.JS and CodyHouse.co for the responsive timeline.

Fonts - PT Sans by Paratype and Aleo Bold by Alessio Laiso. Icons by the always reliable Font Awesome and The Noun Project.

Hearfelt thanks to Iris Lin of Premise for her insightful feedback on my previous portfolio and encouragement that helped me push myself technically.

General Iroh, Kaori Miyazono, and Bill Watterson for the inspiration during rough times.
